name: The Witchery
feater: Users can do course in their free time.
Users can select course and post a course to teach.
There is an admin role and admin can control users.
overview: This is a full-stack project. It is an e-learning-based website. Here students can choose a class and see the teachers list and teachers can upload courses they want to teach.

name: Toy Land
feater: User can see toy as tab then see the details in another page also can see some extraordinary banners.
Users can post toy for selling.
Users can see te all toy list included their posted toy.
overview: This is a full-stack project. It is an e-commerce website. Here users can add toys for sale and see the toy list and details.

name: Chefs World
feater: This website has responsive design and attractive outlook.
users can can logIn and sign up with email and google.
Users can see the chefs and their recipes in the another page.
overview: This is a full-stack project. It is about chefs and recipes. Here users can see and know about some extraordinary chefs and recipes.
